title: A classic Hollywood novel!
review: In the era of EVs with the fancy names like Roadster or Cybertruck, it's like looking back at the dinosaur age of cars! A bit of overacting was there, but the movie making was fantastic. A classic Hollywood novel.

title: Epic end of the mobster genre?!
review: It felt like the classic mobster genre films have come to an epic end. Scorsese, De Niro, Pacino and Joe Pesci teaming up for the last time probably and giving some of the most chilling performances ever can be counted as a great farewell. Also, Scorsese opting for Netflix instead of the Theaters to give a wide release of his movie is perhaps a paradigm shift for the practice of movie viewing.

title: A superhero movie that actually comes down to the earth and work
review: 10/10. Not gonna say much! FBI, CIA, NSA all are on the lookout for Joker reviews in social media. Literally!!Joaquin Phoenix is winning the Oscar. Said and sealed.
